text: :bulb: add domain whitelisting functionality to API keys that would enable client side requests (ajax/fetch) similar to Google Maps JS api
the reasoning behind blocking client side requests is because the key would be visible to anyone. this wouldn't matter if it can only run on whitelisted domains.
then you could use any of HubSpot's APIs on a HubSpot hosted website - what a great idea! :slightly_smiling_face:
You can spoof a domain locally though.
Idea: for custom modules have a simplified rich text area as an option for the rich text module.  similar to the one in the lead flow editor.
For HS sites, maybe it could require a nonce that you could generate with HubL
